item.title: Comparable and Comparator in Java
item.description: Background There are two methods to implement sorting for Custom Class in Java. Comparable< T > It is an interface < T > - the type of objects that this object may be compared to It has only method: int compareTo(T o) { "do something" } Java doc reference Comparator< T > It is an interface
